snippet: The Treasury Department announced a plan to sell $6 billion of its American International Group shares, with A.I.G. planning to buy back up to $3 billion worth.
abstract: The Treasury Department announced a plan to sell $6 billion of its American International Group shares, with A.I.G. planning to buy back up to $3 billion worth.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Treasury to Sell $6 Billion Worth of A.I.G. Shares
headline.print_headline: Treasury to Dispose of $6 Billion of Its Stake in A.I.G.
